meanings.sent1: The new machine is ultraefficient at completing tasks quickly.
meanings.sent2: Their ultraefficient teamwork led to finishing the project ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent3: The ultraefficient robot never took a break, even to recharge its batteries.
meanings.sent4: Her ultraefficient time management skills were like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The ultraefficient car engine ran smoothly and effortlessly.

meanings.definition: Operating at a very high level of efficiency.
meanings.sent1: The ultraefficient factory produced goods at a rapid pace.
meanings.sent2: The ultraefficient computer system processed data without any delays.
meanings.sent3: The ultraefficient dishwasher cleaned dishes in record time, impressing everyone.
meanings.sent4: His ultraefficient decision-making was like a finely tuned engine.
meanings.sent5: The ultraefficient air conditioning kept the room cool with minimal energy usage.

meanings.sent1: The ultraefficient process streamlined operations and saved time.
meanings.sent2: The ultraefficient use of resources minimized waste and maximized output.
meanings.sent3: The ultraefficient chef prepared meals with lightning speed, leaving customers amazed.
meanings.sent4: The ultraefficient organization of the event made everything run like clockwork.
meanings.sent5: The ultraefficient irrigation system ensured every plant received the perfect amount of water.
